definition.text: The Pursue Line indicator is a modification of the Super Trend, with the addition of using a standard deviation calculation to determine the trend direction.

paragraphs.text: This indicator will plot a line to indicate a possible support or resistance depending on the calculated trend direction. The color will be dark turquoise for an upward trend, and pink for downward.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| PursueLine | psl | value, trend |
The parameters the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "Pursue Line" Procedure Loop.
